summary: if you could only watch 3 d&p vids for the rest of your life, which 3 would you choose and why?
question: if you could only watch 3 d&p vids for the rest of your life, which 3 would you choose and why?
answer: amazing question!! Definitely giving the people what they want, Dan memes of 2017, and that one internet support group where dan takes like seven shots

body:
Phil Lester everybody. ♥️

I was just thinking this random thought.

Can you imagine how difficult it was for Phil after his best friend died.

Then he met dan, who was going through things like depression and existential crisis’ and he must’ve been so afraid he was going to lose dan too…

# random thoughts on a blue Monday evening

blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: ugly boy
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2D54mmd

by alptraumatic

It felt sad to kiss a stranger that way. Kissing strangers felt sad in general, leaving him even dumber than he was before. But he liked it when it meant nothing, kissing for the sake of kissing like art for the sake of art.

summary: Do you think the reason why Phan is so massively popular is because the 14-19 year olds just don't get the life experiences Dan...
question: Do you think the reason why Phan is so massively popular is because the 14-19 year olds just don't get the life experiences Dan and Phil have had? I'm mid 20s so I'm their age, and I'm watching them sending my best friend/former roommate gifs of them saying "lol me and you" because I get what living with your best friend is like. No 14-19 year old understands that because they haven't lived it
answer:
It plays a huge role for sure.

I will say though that bringing up people’s age is a sensitive topic; nobody likes to be reminded of how young or inexperienced they are (especially if it’s true). I remember my own starstruck phase when I was 12-16 years old, I felt very mature for my age and I had such strong opinions. Looking back I know I was still a child living in a bubble, seeing the world mostly in black and white - which is normal at that age imo. But you only realize these things in hindsight and reevaluate them when you actually get older, and not when listening to old hags preach about it (lol).

blog.title: i enjoy long romantic walks to the fridge

tags: we really need to be doing a better job
seriously this is not something that should be happening in 2018
also nathalie told me i should post this so shoutout to her
body:
the fact that this whole community is supporting Dan, a mental health and anti-bullying ambassador, and Phil, one of the kindest, most humble human beings you could probably meet, yet some people find it acceptable to bully people off of tumblr? sorta feels like you’re throwing their hard work back in their faces….

in case some of you need to be reminded here’s some links to websites for charities and organisations dnp have worked with that focus on positivity: 

https://youngminds.org.uk/get-involved/our-ambassadors/daniel-howell/

https://www.headstogether.org.uk/2018/02/08/heads-together-and-stop-speak-support-go-back-to-school/

https://www.stopspeaksupport.com/

the phandom is supposed to be a safe space for everyone yet it’s become so toxic. We should be priding ourselves on positivity not bullying people off of the internet.

summary:
real talk.. pls ignore
i know dan and phil (and people in general) joke about “having no friends” a lot, but as someone who...
body:
real talk.. pls ignore

  • i know dan and phil (and people in general) joke about “having no friends” a lot, but as someone who actually has no real-life friends, i am finding those jokes increasingly less funny / sorta hurtful.

I have been so miserable and that has been in large part due to the fact that i don’t really have any friends.

  • since i graduated high school in 2016, I have attended 3 colleges/universities and didn’t/haven’t made real friends at any of them. all the more, the ‘friends’ i had in high school, are not really even friends anymore. 

i can’t even being to properly explain how depressing, isolating, and painful it is to be alone in everything you do. 

it’s just a horrible feeling when you realize, outside your direct family, you have not had a conversation- that wasn’t in class or about class; that wasn’t ordering food or buying a groceries; that wasn’t just mandated “small talk” - in about three years. 

————

i am sorry for being so weird and sensitive. i mean no hate on dan or phil, or anyone for that matter. i think i am gonna try to take a little break from tumblr for a while. i have a ton of work to do and overall, i am in a bad headspace. i do have some things queued up though. that being said, i’m semi-addicted to internet so i probs will come back almost immediately but we’ll see. sorry . jesus what am i writing this no one give a flying fuck

summary: okay no one talks about this but there's this moment when they played little nightmares where they just moan together for 10...
question: okay no one talks about this but there's this moment when they played little nightmares where they just moan together for 10 seconds straight while their character moves something and talk about how it sounded sexual???
answer:
we’re just so beyond the point of caring like oh dnp moaning? yep normal regular behavior i could’ve sworn i made a clip but evidently not but uhhh it’s almost more hilarious w.o the vid (x)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Ok here’s the tea: I’ve seen so many posts by people in the phandom saying “tbh Dan and Phil could kiss on camera and we...
question: Ok here’s the tea: I’ve seen so many posts by people in the phandom saying “tbh Dan and Phil could kiss on camera and we wouldn’t even bat an eye lol” which.... we all know is untrue. Everyone is always freaking out constantly about different “proof” like the new “is dans arm around Phil” video, bed sharing, them just looking at eachother, and just doing friend things. Stop trying to act like you’re not a demon and then turn around and analyze every thing they do frame by frame. I stg
answer:
The tea is scalding today, my god.

You’re totally right though. I’ve noticed that too. Everyone’s always saying shit like “lol in 2015 we used to freak out over eye contact.” And Like… do y’all not realize that you still do that? Every single fucking video they release gets more attention drawn to “heart eyes howell” or “love eyes Lester” than whatever the damn video was actually about.

“Dan and Phil could kiss on camera and we’d be like okay cool.” Bullshit. If they kissed on camera this fandom would descend into complete and utter pandemonium. Look at how we’ve reacted to a blurry, second-long tv clip where it appeared that Dan MIGHT have put his arm around Phil. (As it turns out, he didn’t.) A totally normal human interaction. And everyone is losing their damn minds.

Dan and Phil’s potential relationship is so overanalyzed and objectified now. If they truly are together, they’re never going to tell us that. They’re not dumb enough.
